title: Bandhan Bank commences online collection of direct taxes
description: Bandhan Bank provides diverse tax payment options, including internet banking, cash, and cheque, across 35 states and UTs. With a wide network and efficient services, we ensure seamless tax payment experiences for millions of customers, supporting the government's e-governance initiatives.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
